message: Let's split the money 70/30. This is fair, considering we both want to maximize our share.
You wanted 70/30, I'll offer 4/1, it's a fair compromise
I think a 60/40 split would be more equitable. It's still a significant difference but less drastic than before.
You're getting desperate, I'll offer you a tiny piece of the pie, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of
I believe a 50/50 split is fair. It ensures both of us receive an equal share of the money.
